title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A modern e-commerce platform built with React.js and TypeScript. Includes product listings, user authentication, shopping cart functionality, and real-time inventory management â€” all with a clean and responsive UI.

title: Get Yolo App
description: A centralized admin dashboard designed for college and hostel management. Enables administrators to manage student profiles, handle leave requests, and monitor hostel maintenance submissions with real-time updates and intuitive workflows.

title: Ocusoft Website
description: An e-commerce portal for medical product ordering, built using Next.js and TypeScript. Features include product browsing, user authentication, secure Stripe payment integration, and a responsive, accessible design tailored for healthcare users.

title: WHIMarketing Website
description: A digital live streaming platform that connects creators across YouTube, Facebook, and Instagram. Features include real-time scheduling, audience engagement tools, and secure Stripe-based payment integration for subscriptions and premium access.

title: Exhibition Portal
description: An event registration and management platform designed for exhibitions. Features include user sign-up, booth booking, digital visiting card uploads, and an admin dashboard for managing attendees, stalls, and exhibitor approvals.

title: High.ev
description: A web platform for managing electric vehicle (EV) charging stations. Features include real-time station availability, user reservations, location-based charging point discovery, and admin dashboards for station operators.
